author: LegoCoastalPatrol
title: Part of Sandypoint Marina (Set 1721)
review: The mooring pontoon and fisherman is basic but does the job, the mooring pontoons are provided in grey and stand on grey supports which would be secured to the shore underwater.   There is also a red handrail for safety as well as a red mooring post for any boats wishing to moor up.   The fisherman comes complete with stubble, sunglasses, blue baseball cap and life vest, just what he needs considering the size of the shark he is about to reel in!   The shark is the traditional issue two-piece set with movable jaw.   The fishing rod features the flexible rod, line and reel, and of course the bait attached to the end of the line.

author: Odeinoichus
title: Hooked a Big One!
review:
Set #1790 Shark Fisherman: LEGO really pushed that classic Shark piece in the old days. This little model is a part of value pack #1721 and thankfully so, if it had been sold on its own the money value for it would definitely score a lot lower.

 

That being said it's a fun little addition to the other models from that value pack. It gave you a third Mini-Figure, a small little pier to build up, a fishing pole (The only one I ever had I believe.) and of course the familiar looking Shark. What more can I say about it? Overall if you're interested in getting another Mini-Figure and Shark for your LEGO Town/City then I'd say track this one down. Even better if you can get the entire value pack for a decent price, because the other models really add to the fun of this one. On its own, I'd have to say it's mildly recommended for the fishing pole accessory alone, seeing as how that piece is hard to come by... When's the last time LEGO even used that piece as an actual fishing pole in the LEGO City/Town theme???

author: DarthLuke824
title: SHARK ATTACK!
review:
As i was building my City up, i decided to add The Marina (4644) and this smaller set. They fit very well and look good together! Anyway now some Pros

Pros

  • Cool shark piece.
  • Fishing rod
  • Minifig with lifejacket.

Cons

  • None!
  •  

Overall this set is worth it if you can manage to find it. It is also useful for any other set similar.
